name: starlight postal
description:
a physics game about community and buoyancy.

ascend the mountain and deliver mail to each town as the new hot air balloon pilot for starlight mountain postal service.

balloon:

w/s - thrust/vent

a/d - lean

e - cast/retrieve anchor

q - reel anchor

space - exit balloon

player:

a/d - walk

w - look up

s - look down, drop

space - interact, enter balloon

a game by dorian blossom, jacob buelow, augusto freitas, andrew holthusen, cole nugteren, and isaac tesch

with music by mitchell voneschen

and hot-air balloon consultation from orv olivier

hear the original soundtrack at https://mjvville.bandcamp.com/album/starlight-postal-ost
